conversations.body_text:
Or is there maybe a plate or something to fit both?

Peter Bernhard <peter.bernhard.leipzig@gmail.com> schrieb am Di., 30. Dez.
2025, 01:40:

> Hi, could you please cancel the handbrake off my order. I don't think it
> will fit on my RIG.
>
> SIMSONN

I found a Plate. The order can stand as it is.

service@simsonn.com

But i now see that these U brackets are there for a reaseon.. so the haptic
motors can work better. Why aren't they default?

Peter Bernhard <peter.bernhard.leipzig@gmail.com> schrieb am Di., 30. Dez.
2025, 07:51:

> I found a Plate. The order can stand as it is.
>
> service@simsonn.com

Hi,

sorry that i text so much, but can i add the U bracket for throttle and
brake to the Order somehow?

Peter Bernhard <peter.bernhard.leipzig@gmail.com> schrieb am Di., 30. Dez.
2025, 07:24:

> Or is there maybe a plate or something to fit both?
>
> Peter Bernhard <peter.bernhard.leipzig@gmail.com> schrieb am Di., 30.
> Dez. 2025, 01:40:
>
>> Hi, could you please cancel the handbrake off my order. I don't think it
>> will fit on my RIG.
>>
>> SIMSONN
Hi Peter Bernhard,  Do you want to add the U-shaped bracket and cancel the handbrake order?

Hi, i would like to add the u shaped brackets. The Handbrake can stay in
the order.

service@simsonn.com
